overview: When gazing upon a beautiful girl's winking sphincter, some guys have been known to exclaim in admiration, "What an asshole!" When a girl's dating some seemingly nice, romantic fellow who, in the bedroom, turns into a sexually dominant, anally obsessed fuck beast, she might say the same thing. Director Aiden Riley has combined both scenarios in a double-disc collection of epic anal scenes filled with hard-core choking, brutal sodomy and all sorts of kinky filth. Aiden's "What An Asshole" shows how horny ladies can appreciate a dude who's not afraid to be kind of a jerk.
title: What an Asshole
